channel.title: Timbre on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Timbre on David John Baker

item.title: Thoughts from Teaching Timbre in 2023
item.description: I spent the second half of last week in the UK, doing an in-depth dive on spectrograms at both Goldsmiths and Cambridge.

item.title: MCG Reading: McPherson & McDermott 2023
item.description: This week for the Music Cognition Reading Group we read Relative pitch representations and invariance to timbre by Malinda McPherson and Josh McDermott.
